name: Runaan's Hurricane
tooltip:
Runaan's Hurricane

Cost: 3400


UNIQUE Passive - Wind's Fury: Basic attacks on-attack fire additional bolts at up to 2 enemies in front of you, each dealing 40% − 70% (based on level) AD physical damage. Bolts apply on-hit effects and are affected by critical strike modifiers. The bolts will target the closest enemies to you that are not the main target.
